org.eclipse.contribution.visualiser.interfaces
Interface IGroup

All Superinterfaces:
IMember
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleGroup
public interface IGroup
extends IMember

The IGroup interface is a simple extension of IMember that supports children members.

Method Summary
 void add(IMember member)
          Add a new IMember to this group.
 java.util.List getMembers()
          Return list of all children in this group, the list should contain IMembers.
